name: Paper Bowman
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

Paper Bowman is a 3D FPS game where paper characters use bow and arrows both to fight and teleport around, with the goal of taking a flag to the portal!

How to play

  • Left mouse button: Shoot arrow
  • Right mouse button: Change arrow type (Teleport and Damage)
  • Mouse movement: Aim
  • Tab: Show team scores

The goal of the game is taking the flag by teleporting to its tile, then teleporting to the portal to deliver it and get a point. The game ends when one team scores three points.

Team

Gabriel Lanzer Kannenberg (@gabriellkann)
